scripts.preinstall: echo "var links = require ('./package.json') ['link-dependencies'] || {}; for (var package in links) { try { require ('fs') .unlinkSync ('node_modules/' + package); } catch (e) {} }" | node
scripts.postinstall: echo "var links = require ('./package.json') ['link-dependencies'] || {}; for (var package in links) { require ('fs') .symlinkSync (require ('path') .join ('..', links [package]), 'node_modules/' + package, 'dir'); }" | node
